replies.msg: å’ä¹‹ä¿‚é»

191114 MNET has stated that they will take "Damage Compensation and Relapse Prevention" measures for the future regarding the vote manipulations

(Seoul = Yonhap News) reporter Song Eun-kyung said, "Mnet, which was hit by suspicions of manipulating the series of 'Produce 101', is preparing measures to compensate for the damage and prevent recurrence."

Mnet said on the 14th, "I accept this situation very strictly," and apologized again, saying, "I am truly sorry with heavy responsibility."

"We are currently preparing reasonable measures, compensation for damages, prevention of recurrence and renewal measures based on sincere apology and responsibility within the company."

Police sent Ahn Joon-young PD and Kim Yong-bum CP (general producer) to the prosecution in a restraint on suspicion of manipulating "Produce 101" on the same day.

Police said that in addition to the season 3 and 4, which were recognized by Ahn PD, the production team intervened and manipulated the situation, unlike the results of the audience voting throughout the season of 'Produce 101'.

From https://entertain.v.daum.net/v/20191114154327926?utm_source=share&utm_medium=ios_app&utm_name=iossmf

(Seoul = Yonhap News) reporter Song Eun-kyung said, "Mnet, which was hit by suspicions of manipulating the series of 'Produce 101', is preparing measures to compensate for the damage and prevent recurrence."

Mnet said on the 14th, "I accept this situation very strictly," and apologized again, saying, "I am truly sorry with heavy responsibility."

"We are currently preparing reasonable measures, compensation for damages, prevention of recurrence and renewal measures based on sincere apology and responsibility within the company."

Police sent Ahn Joon-young PD and Kim Yong-bum CP (general producer) to the prosecution in a restraint on suspicion of manipulating "Produce 101" on the same day.

Police said that in addition to the season 3 and 4, which were recognized by Ahn PD, the production team intervened and manipulated the situation, unlike the results of the audience voting throughout the season of 'Produce 101'.
